text:
@WHO @WHOWPRO @WHOSEARO @WHO_Europe @WHOEMRO @WHOAFRO @pahowho Who would think it would? Viruses are 'frozen'. #climatechange
People get sick more often in the cold, b/c people hurdle together in clusters permitting germs to spread. Technically speaking, all year = flu season some where in the world. https://t.co/UU29S38kYc
